net.sourceforge.taglets
Class Taglets

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.taglets.Taglets
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class Taglets
extends Object
implements Runnable

Taglets entry point.

This class represents the entry point for JavaDoc. It provides the register(java.util.Map) required by the JavaDoc standard doclet to register the tags the taglets library provides.

Version:
1.16 (2008/03/30 12:43:21)
Maintainer:
Bruno Essmann <essmann@sourceforge.net>
See Also:
SimpleTaglet
Since:
1.3.0

createSimpleTaglet

protected SimpleTaglet createSimpleTaglet(String impl,
                                          String name)
Creates a new simple taglet using the specified implementation class and the given name.

Note:

The implementation class must feature a public constructor that takes the taglet name in form of a String as single argument.

Parameters:
impl - the implementation class to use.
name - the name of the taglet.
Returns:
the taglet requested or null if it could not be created.
Since:
1.3.0

createTaglets

protected Map createTaglets(Driver driver)
Prepares a map of all simple taglets as they are defined in the specified configuration.

Parameters:
driver - the driver to use to create JavaDoc compliant taglets.
Returns:
the map of single taglets.
Since:
1.3.0

loadTaglets

public boolean loadTaglets()
Loads the simple taglets according to the default configuration.

Returns:
true if the taglets were loaded, false if there was a fatal error loading the taglets.
Since:
1.3.0

prepareMap

protected Map prepareMap(Map map)
Prepares the installation map to be completely repopulated.

This method will return a new map containing an exact copy of the contents of the specified map. The map passed in as parameter is cleared in the preparation process and all taglets encountered are added to the sorter.

Parameters:
map - the taglet map to prepare.
Returns:
a new map containing all taglets formerly stored in the specified parameter map.
Since:
1.3.0

move

protected int move(Map receiver,
                   Map supplier)
Moves all entries in the supplier map to the receiver map.

Parameters:
receiver - the receiver map.
supplier - the supplier map.
Returns:
the number of entries moved.
Since:
1.3.0

mergeTagletMaps

protected int mergeTagletMaps(Map destination,
                              Map original,
                              Map taglets)
Merges the taglets from the original and taglets maps to the specified destination map.

Parameters:
destination - the JavaDoc map to fill.
original - the standard taglets to merge.
taglets - the simple taglets to merge.
Returns:
the number of simple taglets merged.
Since:
1.3.0

installTaglets

public int installTaglets(Map map)
Installs the taglets loaded into the specified taglet map.

Parameters:
map - the map to install to, must not be null.
Returns:
the number of taglets installed.

1.3.0
